attacks.name: Dragon Rage
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. If either of them is tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Jet Sword
attacks.text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Garchomp and this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Dive
attacks.text: Look at the top 7 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the other cards back on top of your deck. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Water Glow
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Remove from Manaphy the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: High Volt
attacks.text: If Raichu evolved from Pikachu during this turn, this attack's base damage is 100 instead of 60.

attacks.name: Body Slam
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Double Stomp
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

abilities.name: Type Shift
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Rotom's type is Psychic until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Poltergeist
attacks.text: Look at your opponent's hand. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Trainer, Supporter, and Stadium card in your opponent's hand.

attacks.name: Whirlpool
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Super Fast
attacks.text: If you have Pachirisu in play, flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Buizel during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Knock Off
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and discard it.

attacks.name: Nimble
attacks.text: If you have Turtwig in play, remove from Croagunk the number of damage counters equal to the damage you did to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Burrow
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Gabite by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Distored Wave
attacks.text: Before doing damage, remove 2 damage counters from the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Jump Kick
attacks.text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Jazzed
attacks.text: If Lopunny evolved from Buneary during this turn, remove all damage counters from Lopunny.

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Poison Berry
attacks.text: If you have Croagunk in play, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

abilities.name: Baby Evolution
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put Pikachu from your hand onto Pichu (this counts as evolving Pichu) and remove all damage counters from Pichu. 0 Find a Friend Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Dizzy Punch
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Defense Curl
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Buneary by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Serial Swipes
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Sleepy
attacks.text: If you have Piplup in play, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Push Down
attacks.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Growl
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokémon is reduced by 20 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Numb
attacks.text: If Pikachu evolved from Pichu during this turn, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Water Sport
attacks.text: If Piplup has less Energy attached to it than the Defending Pokémon, this attack does 10 damage plus more 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Wavelet
attacks.text: If you have Buizel in play, this attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Absorb
attacks.text: Remove 1 damage counter from Turtwig.

attacks.name: Parboil
attacks.text: If you have Chimchar in play, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage and the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
